name: wall
block message: There's a wall in your way.

name: desert
description: You feel the sun's burning rays on the back of your neck. The desert stretches on as far as you can see. Even with all you've seen, you know it would be foolish to continue onward on foot.
block message: The sun's rays scald your skin. You decide to turn back.

name: no mule
description: You aren't allowed indoors with a mule.
block message: You aren't allowed inside with a mule!
